Name: BEAR, VODKA, STALINGRAD!üêª
About the game: BEAR, VODKA, STALINGRAD! - is the continuation of the famous bestseller 'BEARS, VODKA, BALALAIKA!' This time, Motherland sent you to fight vs Nazi forces in the ruins of the snowy Stalingrad. Kill enemies and conquer trophy weapons to get the maximum chance to survive. Your main goal is to kill as many enemies as possible and defend the Motherland from Nazi occupation. REMEMBER! Stay near a fire or drink vodka so as not to freeze. Features: Truly russian spirit and atmosphere Folk songs of the war years Sweet russian vodka
